    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public <T> T convert​(java.lang.Object source,
                     java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Convert the given source to the specified targetType.
        Type Parameters:
        S -
        Parameters:
        source - the source object to convert (may be null)
        targetType - the target type to convert to (required)
        Returns:
        the converted object, an instance of targetType
        Throws:
        ConversionException - if a conversion exception occurred
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if targetType is null

      • canConvert

        public boolean canConvert​(java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                          java.lang.Class<?> targetType)
        Checks, whether the given sourceType can be converted to targetType by this service.
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the source type
        targetType - the target type
        Returns:
        true, if this service is able to convert the given source type to the specified target type

      • lookupConverter

        protected <T> Converter<java.lang.Object,​T> lookupConverter​(java.lang.Class<?> sourceType,
                                                                  java.lang.Class<T> targetType)
        Looks up the best fit converter that is registered in this conversion service. Considers the type hierarchy of sourceType.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the target type parameter
        Parameters:
        sourceType - the source type
        targetType - the target type
        Returns:
        the looked up converter, or null, if no converter could be found
